segment.source: Operations Guide for the Application Virtualization System
segment.target: Operations Guide for the Application Virtualization System

segment.source: The Microsoft Application Virtualization Operations Guide provides information and step-by-step procedures to help you administer the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system and its components.
segment.target: The Microsoft Application Virtualization Operations Guide provides information and step-by-step procedures to help you administer the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system and its components.

segment.source: This information will be valuable for system administrators who manage large installations with many servers and clients and for support personnel who interact directly with the computers or the end users.
segment.target: This information will be valuable for system administrators who manage large installations with many servers and clients and for support personnel who interact directly with the computers or the end users.

segment.source: Provides information about operational tasks for administering the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client.
segment.target: Provides information about operational tasks for administering the Application Virtualization (App-V) Client.

segment.source: Provides information about operational tasks for administering the Application Virtualization (App-V) Servers.
segment.target: Provides information about operational tasks for administering the Application Virtualization (App-V) Servers.

segment.source: Provides information about operational tasks for using the Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.
segment.target: Provides information about operational tasks for using the Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer.

segment.source: For more information about general App-V sequencing best practices, see the following Microsoft Web sites:
segment.target: For more information about general App-V sequencing best practices, see the following Microsoft Web sites:
